title: Everyman's Guide to Ecological Living
description: This is a manual for people who want to adapt their own lifestyles so as to be less a part of the environmental deterioration and more a part of the solution. People, who are the greatest wasters of all, are going to have to consider lifestyles that are compatible with the earth's capabilities to sustain natural life.Table of Contents:IntroductionGeneral Rules to Live ByResources to be ConservedConsumer PowerPollutantsPolitical ActionWill Technology Save Us?Recommended Information and Action Sources
author: Gregor M. Cailliet
